website_summaries.verdict: Whether treating yourself or gift-giving, these large, 4 oz. bath bombs look good in the packaging and offer high-quality ingredients.
pros: Luxury bath bombs that are packed with moisturizing essential oils, dried flowers, and vegan ingredients
Individually wrapped in an attractive gift box
cons: Mixed reviews on the scents – some users wish they were stronger while others rave about their pleasing aromas

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, great gift
customer_reviews.text: These came in a cute pink box and smell great! Each has it's own scent and they aren't overpowering. I mostly buy these for my kids. They love watching the bath bombs fizz, and it helps them have a relaxing bath at bedtime and come out smelling nice after. Great product and great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling bath bombs!
customer_reviews.text: I love bath bombs and so do my daughters. This small 6pack was great to test out to see if I liked them and I did. Has a good variety and good size. Makes skin feel super moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Flota

customer_reviews.title: Never again will I buy these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this product has so many positive reviews. I must assume they are all fake. These are the worst bath bombs I have ever used, absolutely no scent and does not add any moisture to the skin. I used three of these to give them a chance, disappointed every time. All these did was color the water and create a mess in the tub. Save your money and clean up time!
customer_reviews.author: LeciaR

customer_reviews.title: Very good for money
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! I am strongly recommend and I will order again! Thanks so much for the great product with good price!
customer_reviews.author: Jung Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Delivered right on time and exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Thank youAmazon! Finally received something on time! Yeah! Bath bombs are just as described. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Best Bath Experience Ever
customer_reviews.text: The Anjou bath bomb product provided the best bath experience that I have ever had. When you put this in your bath, it defuses rose petals for a very relaxing experience. The bath bomb smelled lovely and looked fantastic. The packaging quality was terrific. This product is worth every penny. If you want a relaxing spa night, treat yourself to one of these bath bombs. My whole family has been very pleased! We will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: C Kray

customer_reviews.title: Vegan and organic
customer_reviews.text: Vegan and organic ingredients! They come individually wrapped in a very cute box (I bought it for myself, but it would make a great gift box). My favorite scents so far are definitely rose and lavender. I don't have a jacuzzi tub or anything fancy, so one bath bomb makes my entire bathroom smell wonderful and my body felt very relaxed after stepping out of the tub. I pair this with my essential oils diffuser and it's basically a spa day for me. My skin felt really smooth after the bath. So far I've used 2 bath bombs and I'm planning to use some more this weekend. For the price I think it's definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Shiberu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for women in your life. Ultimate relaxation!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished a grueling finals week and needed a way to relax. I ordered these bath bombs because the ones from Lush are always so expensive but it's a nice splurge so I wanted to try these out. I absolutely loveeeeed the pink one! It smells so fruity and delicious and its so instantaneously relaxing. The other ones seem just as promising and I'm really looking forward to using them over winter break. I will probably order another set so I can gift them to my friends it comes in beautiful packaging and will make a perfect gift this time of year.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rani

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!! I recommend others to try it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money spent!! I take baths at least 3 times a week; thus, I am an avid consumer of bath bombs, salts, bubble baths, etc. I can share w/ confidence that this product is really high quality bath bombs!!! I have purchased other brands (rated above 4.5 star), but none impressed me as this brand! No brainer, I will be purchasing it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. or R. P

customer_reviews.title: ... bombs and my oldest has eczema so these are amazing bath bombs for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My girls are obsessed with bath bombs and my oldest has eczema so these are amazing bath bombs for sensitive skin. I can hardly find bath bombs anymore that I can actually purchase because most bath bombs have a bunch of harsh chemicals or ingredients in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They arrived right on time in excellent condition. The packaging was beautiful with a ribbon ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift for a friend. They arrived right on time in excellent condition. The packaging was beautiful with a ribbon already on it so I just put it in a cute gift bag and that was it! She has not used them yet, but she loves bath bombs so I'm sure they will be perfect for her! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqulyn

customer_reviews.title: Just wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a birthday gift to a friend and she couldn’t stop raving about it because she loved it so much!!! I’m a fan of bath bombs myself, but I turned to this one because it’s all natural and doesn’t leave a stain on the tub. And, how can you not notice the beautiful packaging? This makes a wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: She and her daughter LOVE them so much she has already ordered another box
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daughter. She and her daughter LOVE them so much she has already ordered another box. It was a big hit at Christmas. Don’t believe they will use any other kind. The orange peel and rose petals in the water was the best!
customer_reviews.author: SGR

customer_reviews.title: Beware lavender bug bomb
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my kids to use. I didn't like all the flower pieces that are inside every bath bomb. It makes a mess in the tub. I used the lavender one when my kids were in the bath and not only was there flower pieces but also bugs! I had to throw the rest away as I'm not willing to put these in a bath tub with my children or myself. Too bad I just passed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy22

customer_reviews.title: Don't BUY these trash bombs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these bath bombs. BUT, I couldn't they lacked smell. The flowers that were mixed with the bath bombs looked like trash floating in my water. It totally disgusted me. I do not want to keep them. These are the worst bath bombs I have ever purchased. I feel betrayed by the positive reviews. I did not feel relaxed like they advertised. No fizzy bubble bath fun. No explosion with essentials oils. No enjoyable relaxing and moisturizing Spa treatment with a bath bomb gift set made from a variety of your favorite dried flowers (looked like trash). Do not purchase these. You will be sorry. I wasted my hard earned money. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. PLeake

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice! Love the flowers!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs smell so fragrant (all like flowers) and the dried flowers embedded in the bath bombs are a nice touch. They fizz and float in the bath very well. The scent isn’t so strong once dissolved. I didn’t notice any difference on my skin after the bath though but bath bombs don’t really do much for me regardless. It’s just a nice way to treat myself and make baths more spa-like. I got this for myself, but the box could have been fancier for a gift set.
customer_reviews.author: Ketty

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely luxurious. Smells amazing! Just love them.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!! These are great... Finally got to use one in the bath and it was amazing! IT fizzed up really well and I can't wait to buy more! I absolutely love love love these. My only concern is how many I am about to buy. They are really good quality the presentation is beautiful it makes you feel like a princess. I absolutely will be buying these again. Very very thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Angello

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Goodness gracious the packaging on these is atrocious. Plastic around the box, the box, paper around the balls, plastic around the balls. Feels like such a waste. On top of that, none of them smell like what they're supposed to. They all smell like generic soap. The only organic part of these is the little pieces of rose or peppermint or lavender (etc) that annoying get stuck all around the tub after. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Just okay product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I didn't read the entire product or what, but I thought these were strange. Presentation is nice, definitely look good for gift giving, but I couldn't tell that any essential oils were used, they didn't have any scent at all, and there were floaties in the water, for example, the one that was supposed to be orange scented, had I assume, grated orange peels in the water, that's kinda weird.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: great for gifting, large size
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are wrapped and packaged in a really nice way. Come in a box and are great for gifting. All different scents and colors. Fiz in the bath for a long time and are relaxing and even help soften skin. Don't leave any residue or coloring in the bath or on skin. Great for adults or kids! We love bath bombs in our house and these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but...
customer_reviews.text: At $3 per bath bomb it's a great deal! The box and packaging were outstanding with the bath bombs being presented in a beautiful way. They worked great and felt great! What I would love to see is the use of less packaging and packaging products. There is no need for plastic packaging of every single bath bomb.
customer_reviews.author: StevenB

customer_reviews.title: gift idea
customer_reviews.text: my daughter and her friend spend a fortune buying assorted bath balms. I bought this set and broke it up into individual bags and put them a part of a goody bag. The girls loved them Every time my daughter takes a bath with one the smell lingers through the house.
customer_reviews.author: B T

customer_reviews.title: trying a different brand next time
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were going to be better than this. It’s not horrible but not as great as it can be. The scent wasn’t even strong once I put it in the bath and it didn’t feel like it made a difference on my skin. I couldn’t even smell it (I tried the eucalyptus one first) when I put it in the bath. Not going to buy again Btw the video showed that it had flowers in the bath bomb but this set doesn’t have that.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Got for my girlfriend to help her relax after a stressful day. Pick a bath bomb to suit the day. Highly recommend for a nice little gift! Puts a smile on their faces every time!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: They all smell the same.
customer_reviews.text: These are much larger than the others I bought at the same time. Our room for vacation had 3 tubs. What was I to do with 3 tubs!? I took lots of bath bombs. These were easy to open, larger and I feel like they had more moisturizing ingredients. I would give 5 stars but every single one of them smelled like lavender. I was excited for the fruit scents but definitely disappointed in scents.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: Anjou makes several different types of bath bombs but these are the best I have tried so far. Some turn the water a lovely color and they all fizz for a long time. There are also pieces of flower in some of them. Believe it or not, the Citronella is wonderful! Totally worth the money since I can't afford to go to the spa. They make great gifts and individual gifts because they are each wrapped in beautiful flowered paper and beneath that a plastic wrap to keep them fresh.
customer_reviews.author: inner city teacher

customer_reviews.title: These Are Very Pretty Bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: These Are Very Pretty Bath bombs! I love each smell I gotten in this set. The scent of these bath bomb last quite a while to since they ate individually wrapped up. Ended up ordering another set as a gift for the teacher birthday gift and she also loves it. They box is so pretty that I kept it own in my bathroom for the small to circulate
customer_reviews.author: Hanh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my sister. So I can't speak as to how well they work. I do open the package to make sure everything was there and it smells amazing! And is wrapped beautifully. I'm very confident my sister will like them. I love that these bath bombs aren't tested on animals/are vegan as well as I want to support such brands/companies
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Keffer

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together.
customer_reviews.text: These were packaged beautifully and smelled nicely. I cant use them because of the lavender one. Lavender causes me seizures and normally i am very cautious when buying things that are naturally scented because of that but i must have missed that when reading the description. Now i cant use them, but will gift them to someone who can use them as they are very pretty and the ones i smelled were very nice smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus420

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very nice and pretty. The bath bombs are wrapped in 2 layers of plastic which makes it even more difficult to open each one. They smell very pleasant. As for the flowers in them, or flower stems I should say, that's it just like a dead flower crumbled at the stem, that's it. No actual petals, just the stems broken into pieces and put in them. Can't really tell much of a difference after the bath skin is clean and smooth but nothing out of the ordinary.
customer_reviews.author: TLB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter’s treat bags for her birthday!
customer_reviews.text: This set was inexpensive and perfect to give out in my daughter’s 10th birthday treat bags. I was super surprised at how expensive these looked in the package. I felt embarrassed to have spent so much more at the retailer stores. My daughter almost wanted to keep them all for herself. The smell wasn’t overwhelming and the colors and fun.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying baths again
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most relaxing week of my life! Lol. As I age I do not feel like taking a bath. It’s hot, it’s primarily to shave, there’s so much I could be doing. Now with the surge of cold coming through, I’ve taken three baths this weeks just to sit. I love the fizz and the color and the scent. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This product was awful. First it turned the water BRIGHT magenta pink....thought for sure it would stain my bathtub....then all the color disappeared. Never have seen that happen before. No scent whatsoever, no moisturizing properties. Just water with lots of pieces of whatever plant that was, all over my tub, on my skin. Junk. Would give it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Airport Joe

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh the smell!!🥰
customer_reviews.text: I cant open these and look at them cause they are a gift for my daughter, but man oh man the smell when I opened the packaging they were in was devine! I can tell from the bulge in the box that they are big! I cant wait to give them to my girl... she is a bath bomb finatic!
customer_reviews.author: Marielle

customer_reviews.title: SMELL FANTASTIC AND LEAVE MY SKIN SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: This bath bombs are beyond fantastic! The smell on each one of them is wonderful and not too strong that you can't take it. I love the fact that it doesn't leave my skin dry at all after use, in fact it feels so soft that's unveleibable. Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C.

customer_reviews.title: I really loved that there were actual rose petal in the bath ...
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about these bathbombs. I recently used the rose bomb. I bought this product because the picture showed bubbles (I really wanted a bumble bath). There were no bubbles and I did not really smell any of the aromatherapy. However, I really loved that there were actual rose petal in the bath bomb and the water changed colors to pink! It was very cool and relaxing. So overall it was absolutely not what I was expecting but an outcome that I really enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs smell amazing! I put one in my bath last night and loved it. It has little flowers in it, and smells so amazing. I absolutely love these bath bombs, and am so happy with them! Relaxing & the aroma is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Martine

customer_reviews.title: They smell nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bath bomb experience. I liked how they smelled, and I'm glad that they apparently took out the pieces of flowers, because I would have hated that. I saw everyone say that it was moisturizing to their skin, but I saw no difference in my skin afterwards. They also didn't really do anything in the bath, other than fizz just a little and dissappear. I always thought that the reaction would be bigger, but I hardly noticed this. -Sasha
customer_reviews.author: JB Smith

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as a present, but I was able to get some use out of them as well. They smell great, and take a decent amount of time to dissolve completely, but the flower bits that they leave are a bit annoying. I would likely buy these again, but they would be better without the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two daughters who are 8 and 10. They have very sensitive skin and these didn’t irritate their skin at all. The colors were very pretty and the smells were great too. Overall I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: AmyM

customer_reviews.title: He discovered my bombs!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a treat to relax after a long day at work. My finance also discovered them and loves them too. They did not stain, fizzed well, smelled lovely and did not cause any feminine problems for me. We'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: AshaT

customer_reviews.title: No scent, no moisturizer, no nothing
customer_reviews.text: All smell the same - eucalyptus and peppermint...until you put them in th water. Then there is no fragrance. Not moisturizing at all. Itchy. Lavender bomb was just purple powder.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Giacopelli

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged bath bombs that make the perfect gift for anyone in your life. I actually bought two, for my two best friends. It is also awesome that these are vegan, I'm also happy to support a company that cares for animals.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Pat

customer_reviews.title: Smell amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother-in-law for her birthday. They smell heavenly. You could smell them before I opened the amazon box. I was surprised with the size of each of them too. They also come in a really nice box.
customer_reviews.author: K Carbo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered about 4 different bath bombs from amazon, by far this was the worst. Seems like all it did was dye the water. Almost no fizz, aroma or water softening. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BAMBAM

customer_reviews.title: The smell and feel are wonderful. However
customer_reviews.text: The smell and feel are wonderful. However, I could have done without the flower and herb pieces floating in my tub. Overall, a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Milfordaquarius

customer_reviews.title: As pretty as the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Smell terrific. Come individually wrapped in rose patterned paper and nestled in pink shredding just like the picture. Good sized - about the size of a tennis ball. Will make a lovely gift.
customer_reviews.author: Admin Math & Science

customer_reviews.title: All you smell is Citronella
customer_reviews.text: When all the wrapping comes off and you get to the box all you smell is Citronella. You open the box, Citronella. You smell the wrapping on each bath bomb, Citronella. Bought this for my step daughter as a Christmas Gift. This will be my first and last purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought several packages of these bath bombs and they all smelled like pure poison! I don’t even know how to describe the smell. There’s a bag of silica balls in each package which is what I’m assuming is giving the bath bombs that aweful smell. I have purchased bath bombs online many times and have never experienced this. I would NOT recommend these... at all! Additionally, in each of the boxes, there were a couple of damaged bath bombs.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for bath bombs for quiet sometime and these work great. I have used my fav lavender today and it worked awesome. I would recommend trying these bath bombs out , they are surely a bomb
customer_reviews.author: Anuradha

customer_reviews.title: Best bath bombs!
customer_reviews.text: These bombs are amazing! First...guys, they float! I love me a bath bomb that floats. Just sayin! Second, they smell and feel amazing in the tub! Flower petals come fizzing out for a good SOLID 2-3 minutes! Posted a video of mine too...grabbing more no doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Desirée

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a family member, these bath bombs come packaged attractively, and better yet smell great. They also make a great gift as there’s a variety of scents/colors. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pelc

customer_reviews.title: The Bomb!!
customer_reviews.text: Theses bath bombs are wonderful!! They are the best I’ve had in a long time!!! They leave your skin soft and moisturized. The slightly tint your bath water. Even my husband commented on how soft my skin felt. Will be repurchasing soon !
customer_reviews.author: S. Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These smell really good and are a great price for 6 of them. The packaging is well put together too. I bought these for me but will be buying more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter, it works well with sensitive skin. Scent is not too strong. Good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my daughter, and she loves them! Ive ordered them a couple times now, she says they are the best! And I love them because they are natural. They come nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: A nice set of bath bombs that would make a great ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of bath bombs that would make a great gift to give to an adult female during the holidays. The set includes 6 different smelling bombs: Peppermint, Sweet Orange, Lemon, Rose, Lavender, and Citronella.
customer_reviews.author: AnimalLife

customer_reviews.title: The smelled nice initially, but for some reason that didnt translate ...
customer_reviews.text: The smelled nice initially, but for some reason that didnt translate to the actual bath portion of the experience. The box is nice, and they are well packaged, but this is something I would recommend for people who dont like strong scents.
customer_reviews.author: Nosy SonSo

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This was the first bath bomb purchase I have made, but I wasn't very pleasantly surprised. I lived in Japan for two years and their bath bombs are a third of the size, but pack 3X the punch. I couldn't even smell the flavor after dropping into my bath. It didn't live up to the expectation I had of it, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: The Broadbear Family

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews - DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Fake reviews - makes your tub look like pee (basically just food colouring water and petals) with a ton of chemicals and barely any good ingredients
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fizz a lot 7/29/19
customer_reviews.text: Great bath bombs! Smell amazing and have natural leaves in them! Would recommend if you like taking baths! ***update*** have ordered about 10 boxes of these because we like them so much!! Seriously the best bath booms we have ever had! Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I love these! Perfect scents and make my bath so much more relaxing. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is I wish the scent was stronger. Other then that its perfect. Great gift too!! Any women who love a good soak would love these!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell, big size, excellent package!
customer_reviews.text: I received today and I am so happy that I bought it. I bought another one now for my friend. This box is excellent like gift. Bath bombs smell like roses and you can see parts of flowers in water. Bombs has big size. It’s really good price for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Olya

customer_reviews.title: Weak scent
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be disappointing. I was hoping for more of an aromatherapy scent but they were weak.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my newly pregnant wife and nowhere in the description does it say that they are not safe for pregnant women. Except on the box when she opened it for mother's day.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Jones

customer_reviews.title: Unknown
customer_reviews.text: I do not know it was a gift to my sisters and I have not heard a word from them if they like them or not
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Rountree

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The colors were nice and stayed tightly packed but the scents were bland. Not lasting
customer_reviews.author: Beth Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and fun gift of relaxation. Great experience with the seller too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eliminate fish smell?
customer_reviews.text: My babe smelled like fish, so I got her deez mofos, and now she smells like fish with lavender...it's very weird (bruh moment)
customer_reviews.author: Christian Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: NOT NATURAL as described
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to say the least. The description says “natural and vegan “ but the ingredients are full of dyes. I can’t give this as a gift as planned
customer_reviews.author: Mama JB

customer_reviews.title: Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: Great product other than the scent being a bit too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryland

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bit of heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, soothing, pretty bath awaits! Love these, they smell so good! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This bath bombs fizz and explode with essential oils and color. The scent feel like some sort of magical cotton candy. Pretty good product!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Ying

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations but they were pretty and that’s about all I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyville94

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for enjoying the occasional bath. I bought this product because my foot was injured and I opted to take baths instead of awkwardly trying to imitate a flamingo. The smell and essential oils are relaxing and a great treat to anyone who wants to unwind or maybe forget their troubles for a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lua202

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: These smell AMAZING and make my skin feel moisturized as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: I never had bath bombs, but...
customer_reviews.text: These had a very different smell for me(not sure if I liked it), however they are gifts and they should or will serve their purpose :)
customer_reviews.author: Big Pep

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift and the person I I gave for her birthday is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: William Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Fake rewiews?
customer_reviews.text: Product was not what we expected, not sure how it has so many good reviews but they are not worth the money. We have tried numerous kinds and brands of bath bombs and these are some of the worst.... Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: The person I gave them to, thru them out. The are made in China which has bad quality control; who knows what chemicals were used; do the Chinese companies care about the end users?
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Product change?
customer_reviews.text: Not the same item as previously ordered. No Rose (had Grapefruit) No dry flowers and wrapping was different. Will not order again. Really liked original product.
customer_reviews.author: John Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Bathbomb
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift. Jamie enjoyed it !
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this AT ALL. There was barely any smell, turned the water purple, and had no moisturizer. In fact it made my skin feel icky to the point that I showered after my bath wasting water. I will not buy this product again. It got three stars for misleading presentation. They made me give it one star
customer_reviews.author: sylvia M.

customer_reviews.title: Weak Bombs
customer_reviews.text: Meh, scent is lost, flowers are a pain to clean out. I've had better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best gift set ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bath bombs!! The fizz up wonderfully and smell amazing! I will definitely be ordering more of these in the future!
customer_reviews.author: AKirk

customer_reviews.title: The bombs smell great in the package
customer_reviews.text: The bombs smell great in the package. After placing in the tub I smelled no scent at all. I just ended up being covered in large wet flower petals that clogged my bath drain. Would not purchase again or give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: Anjou Bath Bombs Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: I have tried these and I loved them - I ordered two boxes this time for Christmas Presents - Trying to get a head start.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any woman or girl in your life.
customer_reviews.text: Got one for both my wife and daughter. They both really liked this product and I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Scent Was Amazing!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: The scent was so good and very moisturizing, and the packaging very cute, great for a gift ! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great bath bombs! Giving them to my daughter for Christmas and she’s going to LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: CK PARK

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful of Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: When I received the packaging, it was nice and the scent smelled great. However, I received an allergic reaction when I used the bath bomb. Mini rashes started to appear on my arms and legs accompanied by itchiness.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sho

customer_reviews.title: Smells soo good!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these and they smelled amazing. They made great fillers for my Christmas gift baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing scents and luscious bath. Less pigmented than higher end brands, but this meets my needs for self-care! Highly recommend. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Da Bomb
customer_reviews.text: These smell amazing. Will be using them as gifts for sure. Love the variety and value.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M & Red D'fly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bath bomb.
customer_reviews.text: Younger Daughter loved them! She was a little freaked our by the flower pedals that come out of the bomb. She wanted to drain her water and start over cause "the water had grass" in it. We explained that was part of the auroma therapy and the experience. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: EonClyde

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: All were amazing - floated, smelled nice, dye the water but not you- except the peppermint one left the tub a mess, ugh. (pictures on IG @marley.keitz.castro)
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: These made a mess in the tub, smelled average, and made in CHINA
customer_reviews.text: These made a mess in the tub with little dried pieces every where, the small on these was only average, and these were made in CHINA as far as we could tell. Amazon needs to SPECIFY WHERE BATH BOMBS ARE MADE, I don't want my loved ones in unknown Chinese chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: LewisAK

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for a friend and she said they smelled wonderful and she enjoyed using them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend and she said they smelled wonderful and she enjoyed using them!
customer_reviews.author: B.Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Smells so yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these bath bombs as gifts twice now! The price is awesome, packaging is pretty and each bath bomb is individually wrapped. The essential oil smells are fabulous. Will buy again when needing a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel A Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Didn't care for fragrances
customer_reviews.text: Who wants to take a bath in Citronella (mosquito repellent) I would recommend Lavender,Rose, Jasmine, Sage and Lavender, Verbena, Citrus etc.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cary

product_meta.title: Bath Bombs Gift Set, Anjou 6 x 4.0 oz Vegan Natural Essential Oils, Fizzy Spa Moisturizes Dry Skin, Bubble Baths, Perfect Gift Kit Ideas for Girlfriends, Women, Moms, Her/Him, Birthday, Valentine
product_meta.description: Bath bombs gift set Anjou 6 pcs, perfect gift for women, girlfriend, birthday, mom, Valentines day ideal gifts
feature_bullets: Set the Mood: To set a romantic atmosphere, simply throw the bath bombs into the tub filled with warm water to enjoy a wonderfully and fizzy bath
Natural & Skin-friendly: Blended with natural essential oils and olive oil to keep your skin moisturized and help relieve stress; leaves no stain on your tub or skin after use
6 Different Soft and Mild Scents: Upgraded, softer scents ensure you choose between peppermint, orange, lemon, grapefruit, lavender and eucalyptus; each one offers a different bathing experience
6 Top Essential Oils: Includes Peppermint, Sweet Orange, Lemon, Eucalyptus, Lavender, and Grapefruit
Perfect Mothers Day Gift Set: Packed in an elegant box, it is a wonderful gift for Mother's day, birthdays, weddings, mother’s day and many other occasions
